misc: Loves basketball even more than Marcus, making some fans wonder if he's a real golfer
biography: Pasi, often referred to as "Susi-Pasi", is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Vuosaari Golf Helsinki with distinction. His dedication to the sport is only matched by his surprising passion for basketball, a fact that amuses many observers who wonder if he isn't a basketball player at heart.

With three past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Pasi's experience is a valuable asset. His most significant achievement to date is his victory in the Hector Trophée, demonstrating his capability to perform under pressure and excel in team play. Although the Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, his consistent performance suggests that individual success may not be far off.

As he prepares for Hector Trophée 2025, marking his fourth appearance, Pasi remains a formidable competitor. His strategic approach to the game, combined with his unwavering team spirit, makes him a player to watch. Whether on the golf course or discussing basketball tactics, Pasi brings a unique and engaging presence to the event.
